languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS) reflects a character's competence in all forms of close combat. It increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces enemy parry chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. It also increases chances of scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in melee combat.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} (ББ) определяет, насколько эффективно персонаж сражается вблизи. Эта характеристика увеличивает его шансы парирования и {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического попадания{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, а также снижает шансы {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} для оппонента, когда его атакуют в ближнем бою.

traits.locale_text: Weapon Skill reflects characters' competence in all forms of close combat. It affects their parry, and reduces enemy parry and dodge chances against melee attacks. It also affects chances of inflicting a critical hit in a melee combat.

Weapon Skill (WS) reflects a character's competence in all forms of close combat. It increases their parry and reduces enemy parry and dodge chance against melee attacks. It also increases chances of scoring a critical hit in a melee combat.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS) reflects a character's competence in all forms of close combat. It increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces enemy parry chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. It also increases chances of scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in melee combat.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS) reflects a character's competence in all forms of close combat. It increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces enemy parry chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. It also increases chances of scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in melee combat.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}代表角色在近身战斗中的相关能力。提高武器技能可以提高{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}能力，同时降低敌人对{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}的招架能力。此外，武器技能还会提高近战攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS) reflects a character's competence in all forms of close combat. It increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces enemy parry chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. It also increases chances of scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in melee combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}代表角色在近身战斗中的相关能力。提高武器技能可以提高{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}能力，同时降低敌人对{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}的招架能力。此外，武器技能还会提高近战攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}。

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} (HA) refleja la competencia de un personaje en todas las formas de combate a corta distancia. Aumenta sus probabilidades de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y reduce las probabilidades de parada del enemigo contra sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. También aumenta la probabilidad de infligir un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} en combate cuerpo a cuerpo.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS) reflects a character's competence in all forms of close combat. It increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces enemy parry chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. It also increases chances of scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in melee combat.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} (HA) refleja la competencia de un personaje en todas las formas de combate a corta distancia. Aumenta sus probabilidades de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y reduce las probabilidades de parada y de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} del enemigo contra sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. También aumenta la probabilidad de infligir un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico en combate cuerpo a cuerpo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}（WS）はあらゆる形態の近接戦におけるキャラクターの能力を示す。この値が高いほど{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}に対する敵の受け流し確率が現象する。また、近接戦で{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を決める確率が増加する。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS) reflects a character's competence in all forms of close combat. It increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces enemy parry chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. It also increases chances of scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in melee combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}（WS）はあらゆる形態の近接戦におけるキャラクターの能力を示す。この値が高いほど{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}に対する敵の受け流し確率が現象する。また、近接戦で{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を決める確率が増加する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} (ББ) определяет, насколько эффективно персонаж сражается вблизи. Эта характеристика увеличивает его шансы парирования и {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического попадания{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, а также снижает шансы {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} для оппонента, когда его атакуют в ближнем бою.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS) reflects a character's competence in all forms of close combat. It increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces enemy parry chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. It also increases chances of scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in melee combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} (ББ) определяет, насколько эффективно персонаж сражается вблизи. Эта характеристика увеличивает его шансы {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} и критического попадания в ближнем бою, а также снижает шансы парирования и {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} для оппонента, когда его {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атакуют в ближнем бою{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} (ББ) определяет, насколько эффективно персонаж сражается вблизи. Эта характеристика увеличивает его шансы {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} и критического попадания в ближнем бою, а также снижает шансы парирования и {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} для оппонента, когда его {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атакуют в ближнем бою{/g}.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} (WF) spiegelt die Kompetenz eines Charakters in allen Formen des Nahkampfs wider. Sie erhöht sein {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und reduziert die feindliche Parieren-Chance gegen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}. Die Waffenfähigkeit erhöht außerdem die Chance, im Nahkampf einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu landen.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS) reflects a character's competence in all forms of close combat. It increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces enemy parry chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. It also increases chances of scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in melee combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} (WF) gibt die Kompetenz eines Charakters in allen Formen von Nahkampf wider. Sie erhöht sein {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und reduziert feindliches Parieren und {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}. Die Waffenfähigkeit erhöht außerdem die Chance, im Nahkampf einen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu landen.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} (CC) reflète l'aptitude d'un personnage à aborder les différentes formes de combat rapproché. Elle augmente sa {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et réduit les chances de parade de l'ennemi contre ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}. Elle augmente également les chances d'infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} lors d'un combat de mêlée.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS) reflects a character's competence in all forms of close combat. It increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces enemy parry chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. It also increases chances of scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in melee combat.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} (CC) reflète l'aptitude d'un personnage à aborder les différentes formes de combat rapproché. Elle augmente sa {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et réduit les chances de parade de l'ennemi contre ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}. Elle augmente également les chances d'infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} lors d'un combat de mêlée.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} (SİY), bir karakterin her türlü yakın dövüş stilindeki yetkinliğini yansıtır. Karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerini artırırken, düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarına{/g} karşı savuşturma olasılığını azaltır. Ayrıca yakın dövüşte {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirme olasılığını da yükseltir.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS) reflects a character's competence in all forms of close combat. It increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces enemy parry chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. It also increases chances of scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in melee combat.
